transcript.text: shalom shabbat shalom this is daniel

restoration ministries<font color="#CCCCCC"> i wanted</font><font color="#E5E5E5"> to</font>
provide one hundred percent irrefutable
proof that the new moon the first day of
<font color="#CCCCCC">the</font><font color="#E5E5E5"> scriptural month begins on the</font>
conjunctive new moon which is when the
moon is completely black it's the<font color="#E5E5E5"> only</font>
moment in the month when the moon<font color="#E5E5E5"> earth</font>
and<font color="#E5E5E5"> sun are in perfect alignment with</font>
each other that<font color="#CCCCCC"> is the moment</font><font color="#E5E5E5"> in which</font>
the month begins and<font color="#CCCCCC"> i have conclusive</font>
proof if you look<font color="#E5E5E5"> in Genesis chapter</font><font color="#CCCCCC"> 1</font>
when Yahweh first made the<font color="#E5E5E5"> Sun the moon</font>
and the stars we read and yah made two
great lights the greater light to rule
the day and their lesser light to rule
the night he<font color="#E5E5E5"> made the stars also that's</font>
in verse 16 and then in verse 17 and<font color="#E5E5E5"> yea</font>
set them in the firmament of the heaven
to give light upon the earth so it's
<font color="#CCCCCC">very clear</font><font color="#E5E5E5"> from the context that he sets</font>
the sun moon stars in the sky at the
same time at the same moment on the same
day the<font color="#E5E5E5"> fourth day of the original</font>
creation week well it's very interesting
when we read about<font color="#E5E5E5"> the Sun and Moon</font>
being in the sky at the same time<font color="#E5E5E5"> the</font>
same moment<font color="#CCCCCC"> in</font><font color="#E5E5E5"> the same day</font><font color="#CCCCCC"> you see</font>
scientifically and this is an undisputed
scientific fact the<font color="#E5E5E5"> Sun and Moon only</font>
rise and set at exactly the same time
they're perfectly in sync all day and
all night at only<font color="#E5E5E5"> one time of the month</font>
and that<font color="#E5E5E5"> is on the day of the</font>
<font color="#E5E5E5">conjunction the day of the black new</font>
moon every day<font color="#CCCCCC"> after that the moon will</font>
<font color="#CCCCCC">rise and set approximately 50 minutes</font>
after the Sun so on the second day the
day after the conjunction the moon<font color="#E5E5E5"> rises</font>
50 minutes after the Sun and sets 50
minutes after the<font color="#E5E5E5"> Sun on the third day</font>
after the third day of the month or<font color="#CCCCCC"> two</font>
days after<font color="#E5E5E5"> the conjunction the moon will</font>
<font color="#CCCCCC">rise a hundred minutes after the Sun and</font>
set 100 minutes after the Sun on the
<font color="#E5E5E5">next day the moon will rise 150 minutes</font>
and so on and<font color="#E5E5E5"> so forth until by the end</font>
of the month either 29 or 30 days
depending on the<font color="#E5E5E5"> Moon</font><font color="#CCCCCC"> and</font><font color="#E5E5E5"> Sun cycle the</font>
Sun and<font color="#E5E5E5"> Moon will once again rise in</font>
sync at the same time and set in sync at
the same time on<font color="#E5E5E5"> the day of the</font>
conjunction well here in Genesis<font color="#CCCCCC"> chapter</font>
1 verse 17 we clearly see that yah puts
the Sun the moon and the stars in the
sky
all at the same<font color="#CCCCCC"> time well the only</font><font color="#E5E5E5"> time</font>
the<font color="#E5E5E5"> Sun and</font><font color="#CCCCCC"> Moon could be in the sky at</font>
the same<font color="#E5E5E5"> time in sync at the same moment</font>
would be on the day of<font color="#E5E5E5"> the conjunction</font>
therefore the only scriptural and
scientific time that the month can begin
is out the day of conjunction of<font color="#E5E5E5"> the day</font>
of the Black Moon this is an undisputed
scriptural and scientific fact any other
calendar including<font color="#CCCCCC"> Crescent or full moon</font>
or whatever other calendar you want to
use is completely unscriptural this is
daniel john lee with<font color="#E5E5E5"> tour restoration</font>
ministries website<font color="#CCCCCC"> is wwwspa- are calm</font>
